subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers receiver Shawn Tucker is out indefinitely after breaking an ankle against Howard on Saturday, leaving the Scarlet Knights with an even younger group of wideouts. The sophomore Tiquan Underwood, who had been rotating with Tucker, will take his place in the starting lineup Friday night, when No. 23 Rutgers opens its Big East season at South Florida.
